dmv.spring.demo.model.repository

Interface RoleRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleRepositoryJDBC

    public interface RoleRepository
    User's Role and its basic methods
    Author:
    dmv

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FULL_NAME_MAX_LENGTH
      Full name may have at most 50 characters
      static int SHORT_NAME_LENGTH
      Each Short Name identifier has exactly this length

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Role findByShortName(String shortName)
      Find and return Role object with given short name (case insensitive).
      Set<User> getUsers(Role role)
      Return all users that share given Role, or an empty Set if no such users.
      static boolean isValidShortName(String shortName)
      This method provides quick pre-check for given Short Name without looking in DB for existing names.

    • Field Detail

      • SHORT_NAME_LENGTH

        static final int SHORT_NAME_LENGTH
        Each Short Name identifier has exactly this length
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FULL_NAME_MAX_LENGTH

        static final int FULL_NAME_MAX_LENGTH
        Full name may have at most 50 characters
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isValidShortName

        static boolean isValidShortName(String shortName)
        This method provides quick pre-check for given Short Name without looking in DB for existing names. Just answering questions: is it not null, has it proper length or does it consist of letters.
        Parameters:
        shortName - a Short name to check
        Returns:
        true if name is valid, false if name is null or has wrong length or contains non-word characters

      • findByShortName

        Role findByShortName(String shortName)
        Find and return Role object with given short name (case insensitive).
        Parameters:
        shortName - Special acronym
        Returns:
        found Role object
        Throws:
        AccessDataBaseException - for DB issues
        EntityDoesNotExistException - if Role with given name was not found

      • getUsers

        Set<User> getUsers(Role role)
        Return all users that share given Role, or an empty Set if no such users.
        Parameters:
        role - Users with what role need to be found
        Returns:
        all users with specified Role or empty Set
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if argument is null
        EntityDoesNotExistException - if Role with given name was not found
        AccessDataBaseException - for DB issues
